name: Endless Puncher
description:
Have you ever wanted to embrace and feel the power of One Punch Man? In Endless Puncher, wield the strength of One Punch Man to defeat aliens and their envious leader Ritos - or simply punch and witness pretty much everything in sight being punched away.

Endless Puncher is a game prototype I chose to work on as a class assignment for Rapid Game Development at Academy of Art University that required to make a game based on randomized selections of a game mechanic (Fragile One Punch Man) and a camera angle (First Person Camera) within two weeks. 

Simply put,  Endless Puncher is a game where the protagonist has the strength of One Punch Man but so fragile that any hazard could kill him , even by simply touching him. I worked on it optimizing the project with physics and minimizing the scripts to handle approximately 25,000 cubes in just one Unity scene.    

Features

  • Play and feel like One Punch Man with power to deliver destructive punches!
  • Explore and defeat various aliens while carrying over a green baby by your side!
  • Avoid delivering unnecessary punches that may destroy buildings which can anger the baby!
